assignment07

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment07.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Product>, java.lang.Iterable<Product>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Piece, Subassembly

    public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Product>, java.lang.Comparable<Product>
    An Abstract class of Product which holds description and indentation levels and abstract methods

    • Method Detail

      • getCost

        public abstract double getCost()
        Abstract method that returns the cost of a Product
        Returns:
        a double containing the cost or sum of costs of a Product

      • getManufactureTime

        public abstract double getManufactureTime()
        abstract method that returns the manufacturing time of a Product or the highest time for its member Products.
        Returns:
        a double containing the manufacturing time

      • addAllParts

        protected abstract void addAllParts(int indent,
                                    java.util.List<Product> list)
        Adds the sub parts of a Product or changes the indentation level, depending on the sub type of the product. Since Subassembly, can hold other Products, it changes the indentation level for it and iterates through sub parts. For Piece objects, only the indentation is changed.
        Parameters:
        indent - indentation level of the product
        list - list of members of Products in the current Product

      • setIndent

        public void setIndent(int indent)
        Sets the indent level for the product. Used to adjust the number of dashes before the description of the Product
        Parameters:
        indent - the indent level of the display tree

      • getIndent

        public int getIndent()
        Returns the indent level of the Product
        Returns:
        int the indentation level

      • setCost

        public void setCost(double cost)
        Throws an UnsupportedoperationException if called on Product
        Parameters:
        cost - value to set
        Throws:
        UnsuppportedOperationException.Throws - an UnsupportedOperationExcetion for Produucts.Overriden in subclasses, Piece andSubassembly

      • setManufactureTime

        public void setManufactureTime(double time)
        Sets the manufactureTime for the Products. Throws an UnsupportedOperationExcetion for Produucts.Overriden in subclasses, Piece andSubassembly
        Parameters:
        time - double for the manufacturing time for Product
        Throws:
        UnsuppportedOperationException

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Product> iterator()
        Returns a iterator object of the Product. Takes in the parts and sub parts of this Product and turns it into an Iterator. Subassembly object can hold sub parts, which are Products
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Product>
        Returns:
        Iterator Product
        See Also:
        Iterable

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides the toString method in object and prints out the Description with an indent number of '--'s.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String description of Product with trailing dashes.
        See Also:
        Object

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Product other)
        Creates a campareTo for Products where Piece is sorted before Subassembly and Subassembly is sorted after Piece.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Product>
        Parameters:
        Other - The produfct to be compared with this
        See Also:
